TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ThenBy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了一个方法，用于在应用 表达式之后，将排序表达式应用于 数据源对象。

span.span: Provides a way to apply a sort expression to an data source object after an expression is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 后一种操作执行使用中的表达式控制，可以使用执行操作的后续排序上另一个数据字段的类。After a sort operation is performed by using the expression in the control, subsequent sort operations can be performed by using the class on a different data field. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何按降序排序 ListPrice 字段的数据进行排序，然后在产品 id 字段升序顺序使用类型。The following example shows how to sort data by the ListPrice field in descending order and then on the ProductID field in ascending order using the type. 此代码示例摘自[演练： 筛选数据的网页使用声明性语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Filtering Data in a Web Page Using Declarative Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f). ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要应用 表达式的 对象的属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the property of the object to apply the expression to.

value.span: 要应用 表达式的 对象的属性。

span.span: The property of the object to apply the expression to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对指定的数据字段上的数据进行排序。The sorts the data on a specified data field. 可以通过使用不同的数据字段执行后续排序操作集合。Subsequent sort operations can be performed on a different data field by using the the collection. 此属性指定要应用的数据字段`ThenBy`排序操作。This property specifies the data field to apply the `ThenBy` sort operation to. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何按降序排序，然后在产品 ID 字段以升序 ListPrice 字段的数据进行排序。The following example shows how to sort data by the ListPrice field in descending order and then on the Product ID field in ascending order. 此代码示例摘自[演练： 筛选数据的网页使用声明性语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Filtering Data in a Web Page Using Declarative Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f). ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::SortDirection Direction { System::Web::UI::WebControls::SortDirection get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::SortDirection value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 数据源对象的排序方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the ordering direction of the data source object.

value.span: 数据源对象的排序方向。

span.span: The ordering direction of the data source object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中使用控件的数据按升序或降序排序。The is used in the control to sort data in ascending or descending order. 使用指定的排序操作的方向属性。The direction of the sort operation is specified by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何按降序排序和上的产品 id 字段中使用的升序 ListPrice 字段的数据进行排序属性。The following example shows how to sort data by the ListPrice field in descending order and on the ProductID field in ascending order by using the property. 此代码示例摘自[演练： 筛选数据的网页使用声明性语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Filtering Data in a Web Page Using Declarative Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f). ``` ```
